translation.en: Fuck.
-Hi. -[Ruth] Liv, where are you?
-I just got your email. -[Liv] I'm fine.
I just have to go out of town for a couple of days.
translation.it: Devo partire per un paio di giorni.

translation.en: [Ruth] Out of town? Is everything--
Everything's in the email I sent. I know it's a lot.
translation.it: È tutto nell'email. So che è tanto,

translation.en: I just don't want any surprises. I'll try to check in when I can.
translation.it: ma non voglio sorprese. Ti contatterò appena posso.

translation.en: I just don't know what service is gonna be like.
[Ruth] Sure. Should I loop Danny in?
This is Danny.
He just came over with the merger.
translation.it: Si è appena unito dopo la fusione.

translation.en: Hi.
Um… nice to meet you.
Yeah. Why… why wouldn't you?
[Ruth] He's just asking if you still want him on this.
translation.it: Chiede se lo vuoi ancora sul caso.

translation.en: He's a great lawyer, of course, I do.
Anyway, it's not my call.
translation.it: Comunque, non sta a me decidere.

translation.en: -[Ruth] Liv, are you sure you're okay? -I'm fine.
translation.it: - Liv, sicura di stare bene? - Sto bene.

translation.en: Let's circle back on prep strategy once I'm back in the office.
I've just never known you to take time off--
translation.it: Non ti eri mai presa dei giorni liberi…

translation.en: Ruth, I'm fine. I really have to go. Um,
translation.it: Ruth, sto bene. Devo proprio andare.

translation.en: -text me if you need anything, okay? Bye. -[Ruth] Liv…
translation.it: - Scrivimi se ti serve qualcosa. - Liv…

translation.en: -[staff] Olivia Rivera? -[Liv] Yeah.
[staff] You're the 1:10 trip to Inuvik, right?
Yes. My plane was supposed to leave like an hour ago?
translation.it: Sì. L'aereo doveva partire un'ora fa.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry about that.
It looks like wind's pretty bad up in Outer Rapids today.
translation.it: Sembra che oggi ci sia molto vento a Otter Rapids.

translation.en: Your plane's stuck there, so, you're kind of SOL, unfortunately.
translation.it: Il suo aereo è bloccato lì, purtroppo. È un po' sfortunata.

translation.en: We can try to get you on something tomorrow maybe?
translation.it: Le cerco un volo per domani?

translation.en: What? No! No, no, no. I-- I took two flights to get here from New York.
translation.it: Cosa? No, ho preso due voli per arrivare qui da New York.

translation.en: I have to get to Inuvik today.
I'm… I'm trying to meet someone before they leave again.
translation.it: Devo incontrare una persona prima che parta di nuovo.

translation.en: -Maybe you can call them? -[Liv] No, I…
She… she doesn't know I'm coming.
translation.it: Non sa che sto andando da lei.

translation.en: Maybe you should tell her.
Can you get me on a plane or not?
translation.it: Puoi farmi salire su un aereo o no?

translation.en: I'm sorry, miss, but I can't help you today.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, signorina, ma oggi non posso aiutarla.

translation.en: [exhales] You look just like me when I was your age.
translation.it: Sei uguale a me quando avevo la tua età.

translation.en: [in Spanish] I'm able to know that.
[George in English] Where are we going this time?
[Sam] Top of the Mackenzie River.
[George] Jesus. That's past Inuvik.
Where are they gonna send us next, the North Pole?
translation.it: La prossima volta dove ci mandano, al Polo Nord?

translation.en: -Excuse me. -[PA system beeps] -Sorry. Excuse me? -[voice over PA] Flight 899…
Excuse me! Sorry. Hi.
Did you say you're going to Inuvik?
translation.it: Ha detto che andate a Inuvik?

translation.en: Uh… past Inuvik, yeah.
This is gonna sound crazy,
but, is there any way you guys could take me with you?
translation.it: ma potrei venire con voi in qualche modo?

translation.en: Crazy for who? You don't even know us.
translation.it: Folle per chi? Non ci conosci nemmeno.

translation.en: Look, I'm small, I have this one bag. I promise I'll be quiet.
translation.it: Sono piccola, ho solo questa borsa e sarò silenziosa.

translation.en: Quiet's not really an option on a Cessna 208.
translation.it: Il silenzio non è previsto su un Cessna 208.

translation.en: I just, I really need to get to Inuvik today.
And it looks like my plane is stuck somewhere and--
translation.it: E il mio aereo è bloccato…

translation.en: -I'm sorry, we'd love to help you out. -[Liv] Then help me out.
translation.it: - Mi dispiace, vorremmo aiutarla. - Allora aiutatemi.

translation.en: -Please. -If it was just me?
translation.it: - Vi prego. - Non posso decidere io.

translation.en: You know, but we're doing this for work.
Somebody else is picking up the tab and then if something happens,
translation.it: Siamo a spese di altri e se succede qualcosa

translation.en: I think they may be liable for--
No, they wouldn't. That's not…
translation.it: No, non lo sono. Non è…

translation.en: I'm a lawyer. That's not a thing.
translation.it: Sono un'avvocata. Non è un problema.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Good luck.
I'll give you a thousand dollars.
Each. I'll give you each a thousand dollars.
translation.it: A testa. Vi darò mille dollari a testa.

translation.en: Look, you guys do Venmo? I can-- I can send it to you right now.
Look, I feel for you. We just can't do it.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per lei, ma non possiamo.

translation.en: I just want to sit on your plane.
translation.it: Voglio solo sedermi sul vostro aereo.

translation.en: I just want to sit on your plane
and travel in the direction that you're already flying.
translation.it: e viaggiare nella vostra stessa direzione.

translation.en: -That's it. I just-- -Okay! Okay.
-[security] Everything all right here? -Yes.
Thank you. We're, we're just figuring out who gets the window seat.
translation.it: Grazie. Stiamo solo decidendo chi si siede al finestrino.

translation.en: Seriously?
Yeah.
-Sure. We'll get you to Inuvik. -[George sighs]
translation.it: Va bene. Ti portiamo a Inuvik.

translation.en: Oh, my God, thank you. I'm Liv, by the way.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio, grazie. Sono Liv, comunque.

translation.en: -Sam. -[Liv] Sam.
This is George, pilot ordinaire.
[in loud voice] Just souping her up. Sam likes to go fast.
translation.it: Lo sto ricaricando. A Sam piace andare veloce.

translation.en: Cool.
All good?
All good.
You're a nervous flier?
[in unamplified voice] I'm a nervous crasher.
-I said no, I'm a nervous crasher. -[chuckles]
translation.it: Ho detto che ho solo paura di schiantarmi.

translation.en: -[rattling] -Is this normal?
Late summer air, mixtures of hot and cold, makes for a rough ride.
translation.it: Il caldo-freddo di fine estate rende il viaggio turbolento.

translation.en: [George] Hey. Hey, no cell phone. You'll mess with the instruments.
translation.it: Ehi, niente cellulare. Interferisce con i dispositivi.

translation.en: -Seriously? That's a real thing. -[Sam] Uh, it's fine.
translation.it: - Sul serio? Quindi, è vero? - Tranquilla.

translation.en: George just doesn't trust anything without a rotary dial.
translation.it: George è rimasto ai telefoni a disco.

translation.en: Isn't there like smoother air higher up or something?
translation.it: Non ci sarebbero meno turbolenze più in alto?

translation.en: Do you have other thoughts? How's my tracking?
translation.it: Altri consigli? La direzione è giusta?

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm just-- -[Sam] Don't worry.
George knows what he's doing. [George] If I didn't, I wouldn't tell you.
translation.it: - George sa quello che fa. - Se non lo sapessi, non lo direi.

translation.en: Hey, you want a drink?
Might help calm your nerves.
-No, I'm good. -[Sam] You sure?
You want a Power Bar, bottle of water?
translation.it: Una barretta energetica? Un po' d'acqua?

translation.en: Cocktail, New York Times?
translation.it: Un cocktail? Un New York Times?

translation.en: -I'm not really a Power Bar person. -You ever been to Inuvik?
translation.it: - Non sono tipa da barrette. - Sei mai stata a Inuvik?

translation.en: There's not gonna be much open by the time we land. Take them.
translation.it: Non troverai molti negozi aperti quando atterreremo. Prendi.

translation.en: Thanks.
So, uh, what… takes you to the northwest territories?
translation.it: Cosa vi porta nei territori del nordovest?

translation.en: I'm shooting the caribou run.
Uh, not shoot. "Shoot."
I'm a photographer for National Geographic.
translation.it: Sono un fotografo di National Geographic.

translation.en: Wow, your job's so much cooler than mine.
translation.it: Il tuo lavoro è molto più bello del mio.

translation.en: Well, I don't know about that. What kind of law do you practice?
translation.it: Non ne sarei così sicuro. In quale ramo del diritto lavori?

translation.en: I'm a securities litigator.
You're right. My job is cooler.
translation.it: Hai ragione. Il mio lavoro è più bello.

translation.en: Caribou run this late? I thought that was a spring thing.
translation.it: I caribù corrono in questo periodo? Pensavo lo facessero in primavera.

translation.en: Hey, you got to go somewhere to come back, right?
translation.it: Bisogna constatare con i propri occhi.

translation.en: I just go where they tell me.
I'll be sitting in a camouflage tent with a thermos full of coffee
translation.it: Sarò seduto in una tenda mimetica con un thermos pieno di caffè

translation.en: and about 8,000 cameras,
waiting for anything with antlers to run by.
translation.it: in attesa che passi qualcosa con le corna.

translation.en: That sounds nice.
It does, doesn't it?
And what about you?
What brings a securities litigator this far north?
translation.it: Cosa porta un'avvocata così a nord?

translation.en: Um, just… boring lawyer stuff.
Uh, it seemed like more of an emergency back at the airport.
I'm gonna take a nap.
Uh, I'm sorry. I wasn't trying--
No, it's fine. it's just I'm-- I'm tired. Took me forever to get in from…
translation.it: Tranquillo, sono solo stanca. Ci ho messo una vita a…

translation.en: -I'm just… tired. -[Sam] All right.
We'll try to keep it down for you.
[woman speaks in a calm voice] Close your eyes.
Ensure you're resting in a comfortable position.
translation.it: Assicurati di essere in una posizione comoda.

translation.en: Inhale and exhale slowly,
in through the nose and out through the mouth.
translation.it: Inspira dal naso ed espira dalla bocca.

translation.en: Focus on tensing and relaxing each part of your body.
translation.it: Concentrati sulla tensione e il rilassamento di ogni parte del corpo.

translation.en: Allow all thoughts to fall away.
You are only your body.
You are only your breath.
[Ruth] Hey, you made it.
-Hi. -[Liv] Hi. Of course, I made it.
translation.it: - Ciao. - Ciao. Certo che sono venuta.

translation.en: You said you were having a crisis?
translation.it: Mi hai detto che avevi una crisi.

translation.en: Yeah, the crisis was that you never come out to these things.
translation.it: Sì, la crisi è che non vieni mai a queste feste.

translation.en: -Ruth, I have work to do. -[Ruth] No, Liv, no.
translation.it: - Ruth, ho del lavoro da fare. - No, Liv.

translation.en: -No. Come on. -[Ruth] We have all have work to do,
translation.it: - Ruth, ho del lavoro da fare. - No, Liv. Abbiamo tutti del lavoro, ma ora prendi questo…

translation.en: but right now take this…
translation.it: Abbiamo tutti del lavoro, ma ora prendi questo…

translation.en: -[Liv] No. -…your work is beating Danny at darts.
translation.it: - No. - Il lavoro è battere Danny a freccette.

translation.en: -[stammers] -[Ruth] We're down a player. Yes, yes.
-Go. No, it's fine just go. It's great. -[Liv] Are you fucking…
translation.it: - Vai, tranquilla, andrà bene. - Stai scherz…

translation.en: -[Ruth chuckles] -Hey.
I think I just got tricked.
translation.it: Mi hanno fatta venire con l'inganno.

translation.en: Why? You thought it was a shuffleboard tournament?
translation.it: Perché? Ti aspettavi un torneo di bocce?

translation.en: I can't stay long.
Okay. Am I ready for this?
I hear you're a shark. I've never played before.
translation.it: - Dicono che sei una pro. - Non ho mai giocato.

translation.en: That's exactly what a shark would say.
translation.it: È quello che direbbe una pro.

translation.en: Is Ruth trying to set us up?
Yeah, I think she is.
Is that appropriate?
-No, it isn't. -[Danny] Right.
That's what I… Okay.
Although, I guess, technically, we're not at work.
translation.it: Anche se, tecnicamente, non siamo al lavoro.

translation.en: Right. Bit of a gray area.
translation.it: Giusto. È una zona un po' grigia.

translation.en: -Why are we flying so low? -[alarm blares]
-[alarm beeps] -No, shit I got nothing!
-Whoa, buddy! We're going down! -There's no pressure and fuel!
Put on your seatbelt.
Oh, my God.
[Sam] Help. Help! George. George, help me out.
-[Sam] Right here. -[Liv] Yeah.
[Liv] Are you okay? [gasping, pants] I can't swim. [heavy breathing] I can't swim.
-Do you have, uh, life preservers? -[whimpers]
-Sam! Sam, do you have life preservers? -[George groaning]
Flotation devices, something? -No. I don't know. I'll check. -[George grunting]
translation.it: - Qualcosa per galleggiare? - No. Non lo so. Ora controllo.

translation.en: My leg is stuck!
Guys, we got to get out of here! I mean, this thing's gonna sink!
translation.it: Ragazzi, dobbiamo uscire di qui! Questo coso affonderà!

translation.en: Sam, I'm gonna need your help. Sam?
translation.it: Sam, mi serve il tuo aiuto. Sam.

translation.en: What are you doing? Sam? No!
-No, just stop, that hurts! -I know it hurts,
translation.it: - No, ferma, mi fai male. - So che fa male,

translation.en: -but we've gotta get you out of here. -Okay.
translation.it: - ma devi uscire da qui. - Ok.

translation.en: Hold your breath.
Please. Don't leave me.
[Sam] Liv!
Help!
Kick your legs!
-Just kick your legs! -[Sam] Help!
-Help me! -Use your legs, Sam.
-It's okay, Sam. -Please, help me.
translation.it: - Va tutto bene, Sam. - Ti prego, aiutami.

translation.en: -Help me! -Hey!
[Sam] Help me!
Sam, look at me! Stop!
I need you to stop or we'll both drown, okay?
-[pants] -Stop, look I got you.
Kick your legs, -I'll take us both in, okay? -Uh-huh.
translation.it: Muovi le gambe, porto anche te.

translation.en: -Okay. -[panting]
-You got me? -I got you.
[Liv in a weak voice] Oh, Sam.
We made it.
We're good.
Hey.
Hey.
Hey. Hey, Sam, wake up.
Hey, Sam.
Hey, Sam!
Oh, shit.
-Sorry, no, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. -No!
You just have this metal thing in your leg,
translation.it: Hai un pezzo di metallo nella gamba.

translation.en: -I'm trying to take it out. -No! No, no, no, no, no, I'll bleed out.
translation.it: - Cerco di toglierlo. - No. Morirò dissanguato.

translation.en: It's pretty bad.
A tourniquet.
You have to make a tourniquet.
Okay.
-[Sam] My belt, use my belt. -Yeah.
Okay. It's okay. I got it. I got it.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Ci penso io.

translation.en: Wrap it round.
-[groans, grunts] -I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
[Liv] I can't get it tight enough.
Sam?
Sam, how do I make it tighter?
Okay, I think I got it.
Oh, thank God it stopped.
Shit, how do I keep this tight?
translation.it: Merda, come faccio a tenerlo stretto?

translation.en: Fuck!
Stay with me, Sam. Please.
translation.it: Resta con me, Sam. Ti prego.

translation.en: Okay.
It stopped.
Sam… Sam, it stopped.
Shit.
I'm sorry, Sam.
Sam… [pants] I'm not leaving.
I'm just gonna go try and get higher to see if I can get service, okay?
translation.it: Vado un po' più in alto per vedere se c'è campo.

translation.en: I'll be right back.
[whispers] It's okay, it's gonna be okay.
translation.it: Va tutto bene, andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: One bar. Just one bar. Stupid trees.
translation.it: Una tacca. Solo una tacca. Stupidi alberi.

translation.en: [in normal voice] Really? Fuck.
[screams] Fuck!
Hello?
Help!
Is anybody out there?
Come on.
Are you kidding me?
Come… [sighs]
[in a strained voice] Come on, are you fucking kidding me?
translation.it: Dai, mi prendi per il culo?

translation.en: Okay. Well, I didn't see you helping.
translation.it: Beh, ho dovuto fare tutto da sola.

translation.en: We'll figure out something better tomorrow.
translation.it: Penseremo a una soluzione migliore domani.

translation.en: Night, Sam.
-[Sam groans] -Sam. Sam.
-Hey, it's Liv. -[grunts]
-Oh, it hurts. -I know, don't try to move. It's your leg.
translation.it: - Fa male. - Lo so, non muoverti. È la gamba.

translation.en: No, my stomach. [groans] It fucking hurts.
translation.it: No, lo stomaco. Fa un male cane.

translation.en: -Make it stop. -Okay. Wait, hold on. Let me see.
translation.it: - Fallo smettere. - Ok, aspetta. Fammi vedere.

translation.en: Oh, God. Shit.
Where's the plane?
It's… it's gone.
We crashed.
-What? Where? -[Liv] I don't know.
Where's George?
We're-- we're just gonna have to wait for them to find us.
translation.it: Dobbiamo solo aspettare che ci trovino.

translation.en: We're gonna sit tight and we're gonna, we're gonna stay right here--
No, they're not coming.
Of course, they are.
George logged a flight plan.
When you don't show up, your company's gonna send--
No, they're not.
Where are the bags?
-Where-- where are the bags? -Sam, National Geographic's not just…
translation.it: - Dove sono le borse? - Sam, National Geographic non è solo…

translation.en: When you don't show up, they're gonna send someone.
I'm not a photographer.
No one's coming. No one knows we're here.
translation.it: Non verrà nessuno. Nessuno sa che siamo qui.

translation.en: You're on your own.
